summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Skymore 30ml Fast Hair Growth Serum, Anti-Hair Loss, Hair Thinning Treatment, 100% Pure & Natural, Non-Greasy, Nourishing & Moisturizing, All Hair Types
Review Date: 2018/07/28
Store: Skymore
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Skymore', 'Item Form': 'serum', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 3.94 inches; 3.07 Ounces'}
Review Text: I waited to write review so this product had time to work or not. It arrived 1July. I used that day & have used everyday as of 28July. There are actual tiny strands of hair growing from my scalp where there hasn't been in 4yrs due to medication needed from a horrific accident. Do exactly as instructions indicate. Product arrived well packaged. As a woman lost hair is devastating. To try products with no results will have most women severely depressed. This product made me smile, laugh, cry, and sob all in that order. It was so much to take in when I saw lil sprout's of my hair growing from my scalp, just amazing.. Definitely worth trying. Only 4 stars because I'm not sure how long I'll have to use or if I stop using will my hair stop growing. Other than that reason I would have given 5 star.. Would recommend.
Review Title: I have tiny strands of hair where there hasnt been any in 4years
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gejoy 12 Pieces Shiny Scrunchie Elastics Scrunchy Bobbles Metallic Hair Scrunchies for Dance Show Party Gym Club of Women and Girls
Review Date: 2018/11/04
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Weight': '0.11 Pounds', 'Number of Pieces': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 4.57 x 0.94 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '797153595056'}
Review Text: These arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Loved opening these scrunchies. Vibrant colors.... super stretchy.... super strong.... enjoy wearing these. Just pull up my hair and in the scrunchie and I’m off on my way.
Review Title: Arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Vibrant colors. Super stretchy. Very strong.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: FAMILIFE Soap Sheets 12 Packs Portable Soap Paper Disposable Hand Wash Paper Soap Mini Slice Scents Travel Outdoor Use
Review Date: 2019/03/19
Store: FAMILIFE
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'FAMILIFE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 1.97 x 0.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '799443862763'}
Review Text: I used with water and at best there was only a couple of bubbles. Thought for the price I’d try these. Normally purchasing a more expensive brand I now have found is worth the extra $$ after purchasing and using these. Great smell. Easy to use. Arrived well packaged. I used 5 sheets and each and every single time these didn’t bubble up like others. My hands didn’t feel clean after use. Threw the remaining sheets in the garbage.
Review Title: Hands definitely did NOT feel clean after using these paper soaps. DON’T recommend purchasing.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jibitee Replacement Brush Heads Compatible with Philips Sonicare E-Series HX7022/66, fit Screw-On Electric Toothbrush Handles, 6 Pack
Review Date: 2019/06/03
Store: Jibitee
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Jibitee', 'Size': '6 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Bristle Material': 'Nylon', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 4.33 x 1.65 inches; 7.37 Ounces', 'UPC': '740030415367'}
Review Text: Arrived very well packaged. I put this right on my Sonic toothbrush.  Easy Peezy.. I have used everyday since received. No issues whatsoever. I highly recommend purchasing this product. I’m a happy customer!
Review Title: Used with my sonic toothbrush with no issues whatsoever. Great deal.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magical Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, Advanced Molecular Hair Roots Treatment, Professtional Hair Conditioner, Deep Conditioner Suitable for Dry & Damaged Hair, Restore Soft Hair Fast
Review Date: 2019/12/04
Store: ELAIMEI
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 2.36 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '882235209775'}
Review Text: I have found this Hair Treatment DOES in fact work. Easy to use. Leaves my kinky hair softer, and actually smooth. No overpowering scent. No scent at all. My hair doesn’t feel heavy or that wet/oily residue others have left on my hair. Pleased with this Hair Treatment.
Review Title: Doesn’t leave my hair feeling heavy or oily looking. Leaves my hair softer.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Toydoooco Tongue Scraper Stainless Steel - Tongue Cleaner Food Grade Steel Rust Protection Metal Dental Scraper with Handy Carrying Store Case for Fresh Breath
Review Date: 2019/12/24
Store: ICOBES
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '6.85 x 2.36 x 0.7 inches; 3.84 Ounces'}
Review Text: Husband drinks coffee all day. These Tongue Scrappers take all that yucky residue off his tongue perfectly. Most definitely helps with with bad breath. He thanked me and said boy these really scrape everything off my tongue. He & I both can tell a difference in him using these.
Review Title: Works exactly as described.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magical Hair Treatment Mask,5 Seconds to Restore Soft Hair, Advanced Molecular Hair Roots Treatment Professtional Hair Conditioner, Deep Conditioner Suitable for Dry & Damaged Hair (1 PACK)
Review Date: 2020/04/09
Store: ALW Beauty
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ALW Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating, Conditioning, Moisturizing, Nourishing, Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '2.05 x 2.05 x 1.85 inches; 3.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: Ok so I have colored hair. I’ve had highlights as well. My hair was visually damaged. Using this Magical Hair Treatment Mask, has softened my hair. Given my hair a bounce. Only use a lil bit to get outstanding results! I make sure my hair is washed clean with no conditioner used. I then use a lil bit of this product and that’s it. The irony is I told husband after my 1use this stuff is like magic, look at the difference in my hair now. He laughed and said “ Sweetheart that just may be the reason it’s called Magical Hair Treatment Mask”. I laughed so hard. There you have it. It’s called Magical Hair Treatment Mask, because it’s like magic.
Review Title: Easy to use. Works fast. Great results are noticeable after using. Does exactly as it claims.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 80W UV Gel Nail Lamp, Professional Auto-Sensing Nail Dryer LED UV Light Nail Machine for Gel Polish Toe Nails with 4 Timers 10/30/60/99S
Review Date: 2020/05/23
Store: ANNI
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ANNI', 'Product Dimensions': '8.46 x 8.66 x 3.93 inches; 14.89 Ounces', 'Special Feature': 'Motion Sensor', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'gel', 'UPC': '782429967262'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:ca3d0e120eef2572a0f2416227df7b16]] Arrived well packaged with no issues. Dries my nails just like I was at the Salon. Easy to set up and use. Programming is easy. Happy with this product. Love that I can paint my own nails and this Nail dryer is greatly useful. Does everything as described. Glad I purchased this product.
Review Title: Easy to setup, program and use. Happy with this product.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Hair Care Products:** Strong focus on hair growth and restoration, with multiple purchases of serums and conditioners indicating a preference for solutions addressing hair thinning and damage.
- **Positive Outcomes:** Numerous reviews highlight satisfaction with product effectiveness, particularly in achieving noticeable hair growth and improvement in texture, showcasing a value on effective hair care routines.
- **Personal Care and Hygiene:** Interest in personal hygiene products (e.g., tongue scrapers) suggests a commitment to freshness and health, indicating a broader focus on self-care beyond hair.
- **Travel-Friendly Items:** Purchase of disposable soap sheets signifies a concern for convenience and hygiene during travel, indicating a lifestyle that values portability.
- **Fashion Accessories:** Acquisition of hair accessories denotes an appreciation for style and practicality in everyday use.
- **Home Beautification:** Enthusiasm for DIY nail care reflects a do-it-yourself approach to beauty, emphasizing independence in personal grooming.
- **Product Packaging and Delivery:** Positive mentions of product packaging indicate a preference for high-quality presentation and care in delivery, correlating with an overall desire for reliable shopping experiences.
- **Trial and Feedback-Based Shopping:** Purchaser relies on evaluation based on experience, often altering future purchases based on satisfaction with previous items, leading to a selective shopping pattern. 

Overall, this individual displays a strong preference for effective personal care and grooming products, prioritizing quality and results while also valuing convenience.

target_interaction.title: Great Learning experience and loads of fun.
target_interaction.text:
This entire set encourages our Grandchildren to be creative. While painting and then playing with these Dinosaurs they are learning colors, and each Dinosaur. creativity and boost their imagination by playing and painting the dinosaurs. The paints are healthy safe, and easy to wash and clean.
Both our Grandson’s, and Granddaughters love having family time fun with this set. Exactly as described.
target_interaction.title_meta: Oukzon 40 Pcs Art and Crafts Supplies Kit for Kids, Dinosaur Toys Painting Set with Foldable Storage Carpet, Party Favors and Creativity DIY Painting Gift Easter for 4 5 6 7 8 Year Old Boys and Girls

videos.title: Interactive dinosaur painting kit-explorative mat that folds into a cute storage bin-nice gift(3+)
